data.name: RPG Sounds - Kobolds - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Kobolds is an RPG Sounds pack of Music and Sound Effects. It includes:

Music
  • Kobold Catacomb
  • Intriguing Waltz
  • Sneaky Trap

SFX
  • Bomb (4)
  • Fly Away (2)
  • Pain Scream (4)
  • Kobold Roar (4)
  • Bear Trap (4)
  • Big Land Mine
  • Medium Land Mine
  • Net (4)
  • Small Land Mine
  • Smoke Bomb

data.short_description: Kobolds is an RPG Sounds pack of Music and Sound Effects. It includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
